name: Containment (itch) (Munro)
description:
you. must. contain. It.

Left and Right cursor to move

Z to fire

you win if the It can no long spread

you gain points for each blue pixel.

you lose if the It touches you.

d={{-1,0},{1,0},{0,-1},{0,1}}cls(1) r=rnd v=pset g=pget for i=0,7 do v(r(127),r(63),2)end b,n=63,127::_::m=1░=16129 for y=0,127 do for x=0,127 do local p=g(x,y) if p!=1then ░-=1 if p==2then f=r(d)if g(x+f[1],y+f[2])==1then if r()>.9 then v(x+f[1],y+f[2],3)end m=e end elseif p==3then v(x,y,2) elseif p==9then v(x,y,1) if g(x,y-1)==2then circfill(x,y,4,7)else v(x,y-1,9)end end end end end if (m or g(b,n)==2)goto a v(b,n,1) if (btn(0))b-=1 if (btn(1))b+=1 v(b,n,7) if (btnp(4))v(b,n,9) flip()goto _ ::a:: cls() if m then ?"score "..j else ?"game over" end
